args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Rearview Camera Image May Not Display/FMVSS 111

Porsche Cars North America, Inc. (Porsche) is recalling certain 2024-2025 Macan Electric vehicles.  The rearview camera may show a blurry image or fail to display.  As such, these vehicles fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard number 111, "Rear Visibility."A rearview camera that does not display an image decreases the driver's visibility, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 8571.0"
